attributes.action: Stop any further development of housing on designated Green Belt sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too much of rural Britain is being lost to housing developments.  This will not have the effect of reducing house prices or providing enough affordable housing as developers focus on high-value developments to maximise profit.  As well as the permanent lose of natural habitat and recreational space, the impact on a country running short of water is huge.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop any further development of housing on designated Green Belt sites."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11198.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SaveTheGreenBelt/
